text: Ana zafamofo ani'na ramimo'a knare'zantfa huno zagasefage nehigeno ragamo'a avite'neanki'za maka mani'naza vahemo'zane zagagafamo'zanena raga'a ne'naze. Ana zafamofo tonapinka afi zagagafamo'za enemanizageno, namamo'za azankuna'afina e'za no eme ki'naze. Ana nehazage'za maka ama mopafi zagagafamo'za ana zafaretike ne'zana eme ne'naze.
